verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's rescission bill] [ARGM-ADV: actually] [V: cuts] [ARG1: just $ 57 million] [ARG2: from current year spending] . So that oughta solve the fiscal crisis .
President Donald Trump 's rescission bill actually cuts just $ 57 million from current year spending . So [ARG0: that] [ARGM-MOD: oughta] [V: solve] [ARG1: the fiscal crisis] .
